key_phrases: It's like applying for a job, but end of the day it's for like $5K.
This is not a good way.
I think you should have scouts.
This will inspire artists to get out there and create more.
With good scouts and time, you will be able to find who is making an impact.
barriers_identified: low financial reward relative to effort
solutions_proposed: use scouts to proactively identify and connect with artists
